Package ru.nsu.pozhidaev

Class RecordBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook
  • public class RecordBook
extends java.lang.Object
    record book that contain subjects and their grades, student should have one unique record book.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RecordBook​(java.lang.String studentName)
      constructor.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addGrade​(java.lang.String subject, int grade, int semester, GradeType gradeType)
      add grade for student to record book.
      void addPass​(java.lang.String subject, boolean pass, int semester)
      add grade with type pass.
      void addSubject​(java.lang.String subject)
      add string of new subject into hashtable.
      boolean chanceToGetHigherGrants()
      chance to increase student grant calculated by collecting all grades, if there is no grades less than 5, student will get higher grant.
      boolean chanceToGetRedDiploma()
      chance to get red diploma calculated by collecting all final grade of exams and diffpasses, if there is no three grades, and number of fives is more than 74 percentage, and have excellent qualification work.
      boolean chanceToStudyFree()
      chance to study free calculted by collect results on exams by last two semesters, and check if there is no three grades.

      get average grade point.

      increase current semester and increase it for all subjects in hashtable.

      • addGrade

        public void addGrade​(java.lang.String subject,
                     int grade,
                     int semester,
                     GradeType gradeType)
              throws ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NoSuchSemesterYet,
                     ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook.NoSuchSubjectYet,
                     ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NotValidGradeNumberException
        add grade for student to record book.
        Parameters:
        subject - string of name of existing subject in hashtable.
        grade - number that means success of grade.
        semester - to which need to add grade to subject.
        gradeType - enum type of grade.
        Throws:
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NoSuchSemesterYet - if current semester is smaller than called.
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook.NoSuchSubjectYet - if such subject wasn't found in hashtable.
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NotValidGradeNumberException

      • addPass

        public void addPass​(java.lang.String subject,
                    boolean pass,
                    int semester)
             throws ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NoSuchSemesterYet,
                    ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook.NoSuchSubjectYet,
                    ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NotValidGradeNumberException
        add grade with type pass.
        Parameters:
        subject - string of name of existing subject in hashtable.
        pass - bool success or not.
        semester - to which need to add grade to subject.
        Throws:
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NoSuchSemesterYet - if current semester is smaller than called.
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.RecordBook.NoSuchSubjectYet - if such subject wasn't found in hashtable.
        ru.nsu.pozhidaev.Subject.NotValidGradeNumberException

      • gradePointAverage

        public double gradePointAverage()
        get average grade point. counting by collect all grades without passes and deviding them on their number.
        Returns:
        result sum devided on size of grades.

      • chanceToStudyFree

        public boolean chanceToStudyFree()
        chance to study free calculted by collect results on exams by last two semesters, and check if there is no three grades.
        Returns:
        can student study free or not.

      • chanceToGetRedDiploma

        public boolean chanceToGetRedDiploma()
        chance to get red diploma calculated by collecting all final grade of exams and diffpasses, if there is no three grades, and number of fives is more than 74 percentage, and have excellent qualification work.
        Returns:
        can student get red diploma or not.

      • chanceToGetHigherGrants

        public boolean chanceToGetHigherGrants()
        chance to increase student grant calculated by collecting all grades, if there is no grades less than 5, student will get higher grant.
        Returns:
        can student have higher grant or not.
